humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest tumor size in the left breast is 3.4 cm, which falls within the criteria for a T2 tumor (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has an invasive ductal carcinoma in the left breast, measuring 3.4 cm in size (T2 stage), based on the pathologic measurement provided in the report. The T stage is based on the size of the primary tumor, and in this case, it is larger than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm in greatest dimension (T2).
